resources.title: Martial arts gym
resources.description: We have a range of classes in a variety of martials arts including jiu jitsu, judo, karate, and muay thai. We have experienced trainers in all these to help you achieve the best.

resources.title: Gym
resources.description: Our space offers gym equipment and trainers, as well as changing facilities plus shower.

resources.title: Lesiure
resources.description: We also have both a sauna and a stream room to suppplement a way. These can aid in the recover of your body after pyhsical exercise.

resources.title: instructors
resources.description: We have high qulaity instrucutors in a variety of martial arts. Multiple instructors in our dojo are black belts and veterans in their respective marital art/s.
